mapper.sql: TID, TKEY, SERVICE_NAME, CONF_TYPE, CONF_CRON_EXPRESSION, CONF_DELAY_TM, CONF_INTERVAL_TM, CONF_EXE_TIMES, PROCESSOR, STATUS_END, MUTEX, MUTEX_TM, STATUS, ALIVE_TM, VALID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ts_task
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ts_task (TID, TKEY, SERVICE_NAME, CONF_TYPE, CONF_CRON_EXPRESSION, CONF_DELAY_TM, CONF_INTERVAL_TM, CONF_EXE_TIMES, PROCESSOR, STATUS_END, MUTEX, MUTEX_TM, STATUS, ALIVE_TM, VALID) values (#{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confCronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confDelayTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confIntervalTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confExeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{processor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusEnd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mutex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mutexTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{aliveTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valid,jdbcType=CHAR})

update ts_task
TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TKEY = #{record.tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_TYPE = #{record.confType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONF_DELAY_TM = #{record.confDelayTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},

STATUS_END = #{record.statusEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
MUTEX = #{record.mutex,jdbcType=CHAR},
MUTEX_TM = #{record.mutexTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
ALIVE_TM = #{record.aliveTm,jdbcType=BIGINT},
VALID = #{record.valid,jdbcType=CHAR},

update ts_task set TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TKEY = #{record.tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_NAME = #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_TYPE = #{record.confType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_CRON_EXPRESSION = #{record.confCronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_DELAY_TM = #{record.confDelayTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONF_INTERVAL_TM = #{record.confIntervalTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONF_EXE_TIMES = #{record.confExeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PROCESSOR = #{record.processor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_END = #{record.statusEnd,jdbcType=CHAR}, MUTEX = #{record.mutex,jdbcType=CHAR}, MUTEX_TM = #{record.mutexTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, ALIVE_TM = #{record.aliveTm,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VALID = #{record.valid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update ts_task
TKEY = #{tkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_TYPE = #{confType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where TID = #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
